title: [Medicine] 456 studies on human participants from IHU-MI (Didier Raoult's institute) have been found to have serious ethical concerns. 248 of these are vastly heterogeneous studies with the same ethics approval number.

[Health] New tool for early identification of dementia risk: researchers found that an interviewer’s rating of a cognitively healthy person’s memory successfully predicted the likelihood of developing dementia over a 15-year period
